text: Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨ bizir kam gɨnɨghnɨgh, nan pam mɨsoghan markɨ. Nan gumazir ekiam, nɨ uabɨ gumazitam puram a mɨsoghezɨ, an aremezir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, men ghuzibar osɨmtɨzitam nɨn dafarimningɨn ikian kogham. Ga uaning, kɨ nɨn ingangarir amizim, kɨ kamaghɨn nɨn azai, Ikiavɨra Itir God gɨn deraghvɨra nɨ damutɨ, nɨ na ginɨrɨgh deraghvɨra na damu.”
